# The `VPlan` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vplan">VPlan</a> models a candidate for vectorization, encoding various decisions take to produce efficient output IR, including which branches, basic-blocks and output IR instructions to generate, and their cost. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::VPlan</CodeBlock>

</IncludesList>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vplan">VPlan</a> models a candidate for vectorization, encoding various decisions take to produce efficient output IR, including which branches, basic-blocks and output IR instructions to generate, and their cost.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vplan">VPlan</a> holds a Hierarchical-CFG of VPBasicBlocks and VPRegionBlocks rooted at an Entry <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpbasicblock">VPBasicBlock</a>.

Definition at line 3815 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h">VPlan.h</a>.

## Public Static Functions

### createInitialVPlan() {#a5a956378c8f267d4b2afc6e036a08d42}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>VPlanPtr VPlan::createInitialVPlan (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42; InductionTy, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/predicatedscalarevolution">PredicatedScalarEvolution</a> &amp; PSE, bool RequiresScalarEpilogueCheck, bool TailFolded, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; TheLoop)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Create initial <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vplan">VPlan</a>, having an &quot;entry&quot; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpbasicblock">VPBasicBlock</a> (wrapping original scalar pre-header) which contains <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> expansions that need to happen before the CFG is modified (when executing a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vplan">VPlan</a> for the epilogue vector loop, the original entry needs to be replaced by a new one); a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpbasicblock">VPBasicBlock</a> for the vector pre-header, followed by a region for the vector loop, followed by the middle <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpbasicblock">VPBasicBlock</a>.

If a check is needed to guard executing the scalar epilogue loop, it will be added to the middle block, together with VPBasicBlocks for the scalar preheader and exit blocks. <code>InductionTy</code> is the type of the canonical induction and used for related values, like the trip count expression.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h/#l03913">3913</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h">VPlan.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-cpp/#l00844">844</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-cpp">VPlan.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
